content: I’ve actually been trying to create an ethereum based react-script add-on for create-react-app by implementing the examples from http://ethjs-examples.surge.sh/ and well…. it’s been mildly frustrating because I can get them to work on his repo, but when I try to convert it into a react architecture it somehow get’s lost in translation and it throws these weird errors about rpc payload failures that I’m having trouble making sense of: [ethjs-rpc] rpc error with payload  but yeah, it doesn’t do that when I use the Kovan network with metamask — but does with Ropsten. Anyhow, just trying to get a good react demo app with simple ethereum integration. Not saying it’s anywhere near “shareable” yet, but it’s: create-react-app --scripts-version ethereum-react would love some feedback…. but maybe wait till the end of the weekend until I can actually go through your walkthrough cause I’ll probably find some solutions in there :)
